title: My Dragon Mother: The Dragon's Cup
description: Book 1 of the "My Dragon Mother" series.The Race of Wizards is not a race at all. In fact, they are created through the kindness of their adoptive dragon mothers. Not all dragons seek to hatch their young; choosing instead to raise orphaned humans as their own. These children are transformed into powerful Wizards, a group of immortals forming the magical bridge between two very different The Natural & Supernatural. "My Dragon Mother" is the legendary tale of such a boy in the mystical land of Bavaria.Other books in the Book II -- My Dragon Sacred FallsBook III -- My Dragon The Enchanted Forest
author: Arturo Huerta
